mean_cn: n.（保险锁等的）组合码；结合，联合
mean_en: two or more things joined or mixed together to form a single unit; the act of joining or mixing together two or more things to form a single unit
sentence: A combination is a series of numbers or letters used to open a combination lock.
sentence_trans: 组合码是用来开密码锁的一系列数字或字母。
word_etyma: com共同 + bin=bine藤蔓 + ation表名词 → combination结合，联合
